trans-unit.source: Sign-up Today

seg-source.mrk: Sign-up Today

target.mrk: Regístrate Hoy

trans-unit.source: Tap-In

seg-source.mrk: Tap-In

target.mrk: Ingresa

trans-unit.source: Accept %{expert}'s invitation to join %{expert} virtual practice. Get your health questions answered, prescriptions sent to your local pharmacy, lab tests ordered, and so much more—all from your phone or computer. With %{expert} on your doctor care-team, you'll have access to a doctor whenever you need it, wherever you are.

seg-source.mrk: Accept %{expert}'s invitation to join %{expert} virtual practice. Get your health questions answered, prescriptions sent to your local pharmacy, lab tests ordered, and so much more—all from your phone or computer. With %{expert} on your doctor care-team, you'll have access to a doctor whenever you need it, wherever you are.

target.mrk: Acepta la invitación de %{expert} para unirte al consultorio virtual de %{expert}. Obtén respuestas para tus preguntas de salud, envio de recetas a tu farmacia local, órdenes para pruebas de laboratorio, y mucho más — todo desde tu teléfono o computadora. Con %{expert} en tu equipo de atención médico, tendrás acceso a un doctor cuando sea que lo necesites, donde sea que estés.

trans-unit.resname: Are you sure you want to remove this translator?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove this translator?

seg-source.mrk: Are you sure you want to remove this translator?

target.mrk: ¿Estás seguro que quieres eliminar a este traductor?

trans-unit.source: All you need to get started is a computer, smartphone, or tablet. Get immediate and personalized health services from a network of top doctors to your fingertips

seg-source.mrk: All you need to get started is a computer, smartphone, or tablet. Get immediate and personalized health services from a network of top doctors to your fingertips

target.mrk: Todo lo que necesitas para empezar es una computadora, teléfono inteligente o tableta. Obtén servicios de salud personalizados e inmediatos de una red de los mejores doctores a la punta de tus dedos.

trans-unit.source: All you need is a computer, smartphone, or tablet. Tap into the wisdom of top doctors to help you take control of your health and well-being to feel good every day.

seg-source.mrk: All you need is a computer, smartphone, or tablet. Tap into the wisdom of top doctors to help you take control of your health and well-being to feel good every day.

target.mrk: Todo lo que necesitas es una computadora, teléfono inteligente o tableta. Aprovecha la sabiduría de los mejores doctores para ayudarte a hacerte cargo de tu salud y bienestar para sentirte bien todos los días.

trans-unit.source: Let’s get you signed up today so you can receive the care and support you and your loved ones need from your mobile device or personal computer.

seg-source.mrk: Let’s get you signed up today so you can receive the care and support you and your loved ones need from your mobile device or personal computer.

target.mrk: ¡Hay que registrarte hoy para que puedas recibir la atención y apoyo que tu y tus seres queridos necesitan desde tu dispositivo móvil o computadora personal.

trans-unit.source: This link will expire in 24 hours and can only be accessed while logged into the account using this email.

seg-source.mrk: This link will expire in 24 hours and can only be accessed while logged into the account using this email.

target.mrk: Este enlace expirará en 24 horas y solo puede ser accedido mientras se haya iniciado sesión en la cuenta que usa este correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: Prescribed Medications:

seg-source.mrk: Prescribed Medications:

target.mrk: Medicamentos Recetados:

trans-unit.source: Pharmacy:

seg-source.mrk: Pharmacy:

target.mrk: Farmacia:

trans-unit.source: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. Your voice is music to my ears, but I don't think we've met. I'm Doctor A.I., and I work with more than %DOCTORS_COUNT% top doctors to put our heads together and show you the best path to feeling good.

seg-source.mrk: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. Your voice is music to my ears, but I don't think we've met. I'm Doctor A.I., and I work with more than %DOCTORS_COUNT% top doctors to put our heads together and show you the best path to feeling good.

target.mrk: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. Tu voz es música para mis oídos, pero no creo que no hayamos conocido. Soy Doctor A.I., y trabajo con más de %DOCTORS_COUNT% de los mejores doctores para juntar nuestras cabezas y mostrarte el mejor camino para sentirte bien

trans-unit.source: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. It's Doctor A.I. ...Welcome back %LOGGED_IN_USER_NAME%. %GREETING_RETURNING% I've been wondering how you've been since we last connected.

seg-source.mrk: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. It's Doctor A.I. ...Welcome back %LOGGED_IN_USER_NAME%. %GREETING_RETURNING% I've been wondering how you've been since we last connected.

target.mrk: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. Es Doctor A.I. ...Bienvenido %LOGGED_IN_USER_NAME%. %GREETING_RETURNING% Me he estado preguntando cómo has estado desde la última vez que nos conectamos

trans-unit.source: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. It's Doctor A.I. ...Welcome back. %GREETING_RETURNING% I've been wondering how you've been since we last connected.

seg-source.mrk: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. It's Doctor A.I. ...Welcome back. %GREETING_RETURNING% I've been wondering how you've been since we last connected.

target.mrk: %TIME_BASED_GREET%. Es Doctor A.I. ...Bienvenido. %GREETING_RETURNING% Me he estado preguntando cómo has estado desde la última vez que nos conectamos

trans-unit.source: I have a great idea: You'll get more accurate advice if I link to your account. Do you have a HealthTap account that you'd like me to link now?

seg-source.mrk: I have a great idea: You'll get more accurate advice if I link to your account. Do you have a HealthTap account that you'd like me to link now?

target.mrk: Tengo una gran idea: Obtendrás consejo más acertado si me enlazo a tu cuenta. ¿Tienes una cuenta de HealthTap a la que te gustaría que me enlazara en este momento?

trans-unit.source: Just a quick reminder that I can give you better guidance if we link your account. How about we do it now?

seg-source.mrk: Just a quick reminder that I can give you better guidance if we link your account. How about we do it now?

target.mrk: Solo un rápido recordatorio de que puedo darte mejor orientación si enlazamos tu cuenta. ¿Qué tal si hacemos eso ahora?

trans-unit.source: %OPENER%. We can link it later.

seg-source.mrk: %OPENER%. We can link it later.

target.mrk: %OPENER%. Podemos enlazarla más tarde.

trans-unit.source: I can already tell we're going to get along fabulously. I sent a link to your Alexa app — just tap to log in and link your HealthTap account. When you're done, just start our conversation again. I will be standing by. Talk to you soon!

seg-source.mrk: I can already tell we're going to get along fabulously. I sent a link to your Alexa app — just tap to log in and link your HealthTap account. When you're done, just start our conversation again. I will be standing by. Talk to you soon!

target.mrk: Ya puedo ver que nos vamos a llevar muy bien. Envié un enlace a tu aplicación de Alexa — solo tócalo para iniciar sesión y enlazar tu cuenta de HealthTap. Cuando termines, solo comienza nuestra conversación otra vez. Estaré en espera. ¡Hablamos pronto!

trans-unit.source: Hmm, it appears your account is still not linked. Tap 'Link Account' in your Alexa app and say 'Done' once you've completed the process. Or just say 'Cancel' if you change your mind.

seg-source.mrk: Hmm, it appears your account is still not linked. Tap 'Link Account' in your Alexa app and say 'Done' once you've completed the process. Or just say 'Cancel' if you change your mind.

target.mrk: Hmm, parece que tu cuenta aún no está enlazada. Toca 'Enlazar Cuenta' en tu aplicación de Alexa y si 'Listo' una vez que hayas completado el proceso. O solo di 'Cancelar' si cambias de opinión.

trans-unit.source: Success! We've got you linked.

seg-source.mrk: Success! We've got you linked.

target.mrk: ¡Éxito! Te hemos enlazado!

trans-unit.source: %OPENING_TRANSITION% I'm still working on my communication skills. If it helps at any point in our conversation, you can ask me to repeat myself. Now, tell me who we're here for today — are we helping you, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

seg-source.mrk: %OPENING_TRANSITION% I'm still working on my communication skills. If it helps at any point in our conversation, you can ask me to repeat myself. Now, tell me who we're here for today — are we helping you, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

target.mrk: %OPENING_TRANSITION% Todavía estoy trabajando en mis habilidades de comunicación. Si ayudaría, en cualquier momento en nuestra conversación puedes pedirme que repita algo. Ahora, dime por quién estamos aquí hoy — te estamos ayudando a ti, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% o a alguien más?

trans-unit.source: %OPENING_TRANSITION% I'm still working on my communication skills. If it helps at any point in our conversation, you can ask me to repeat myself. Now, tell me who we're here for today — are we helping you, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %SUBACCOUNTS% %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

seg-source.mrk: %OPENING_TRANSITION% I'm still working on my communication skills. If it helps at any point in our conversation, you can ask me to repeat myself. Now, tell me who we're here for today — are we helping you, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %SUBACCOUNTS% %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

target.mrk: %OPENING_TRANSITION% Todavía estoy trabajando en mis habilidades de comunicación. Si ayudaría, en cualquier momento en nuestra conversación puedes pedirme que repita algo. Ahora, dime por quién estamos aquí hoy — te estamos ayudando a ti, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% o a alguien más?

trans-unit.source: Oh, someone new! I love meeting new people. How are they related to you? You can say things like husband, mother, or daughter...

seg-source.mrk: Oh, someone new! I love meeting new people. How are they related to you? You can say things like husband, mother, or daughter...

target.mrk: ¡Oh, alguien nuevo! Amo conocer a nuevas personas. ¿Cuál es su relación contigo? Puedes decir cosas como esposo, madre o hija...

trans-unit.source: I see. I'm here for you. Let's continue.

seg-source.mrk: I see. I'm here for you. Let's continue.

target.mrk: Ya veo. Estoy aquí para ti. Continuemos.

trans-unit.source: I see. I'm here for %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%. Let's continue.

seg-source.mrk: I see. I'm here for %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%. Let's continue.

target.mrk: Ya veo. Estoy aquí para %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%. Continuemos.

trans-unit.source: For more accurate advice, it helps our doctors to know the year you were born. Your voice is certainly not giving away your age. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

seg-source.mrk: For more accurate advice, it helps our doctors to know the year you were born. Your voice is certainly not giving away your age. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

target.mrk: Para consejo más certero, le ayuda a nuestros doctores saber el año en que naciste. Tu voz no nos dice tu edad. Por favor, di tu año de nacimiento o da una aproximación si no estás seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more accurate advice, it helps our doctors to know the year %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% was born. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

seg-source.mrk: For more accurate advice, it helps our doctors to know the year %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% was born. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

target.mrk: Para consejo más certero, le ayuda a nuestros doctores saber el año en que nació %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%. Por favor, di el año de nacimiento o da una aproximación si no estás seguro.

trans-unit.source: %AGE_TO_USE% years old! Such a wonderful age. We would never have guessed.

seg-source.mrk: %AGE_TO_USE% years old! Such a wonderful age. We would never have guessed.

target.mrk: ¡%AGE_TO_USE% años de edad! Qué tan maravillosa edad. Nunca lo hubiéramos adivinado.

trans-unit.source: %AGE_TO_USE% years old! A growing child. We would never have guessed.

seg-source.mrk: %AGE_TO_USE% years old! A growing child. We would never have guessed.

target.mrk: ¡%AGE_TO_USE% años de edad! Un niño en crecimiento. Nunca lo hubiéramos adivinado.

trans-unit.source: %AGE_TO_USE% years young! Splendid. I would never have guessed.

seg-source.mrk: %AGE_TO_USE% years young! Splendid. I would never have guessed.

target.mrk: ¡%AGE_TO_USE% años de juventud! Espléndido. Nunca lo hubiéramos adivinado.

trans-unit.source: I'm really bad at guessing. Are you a male or a female?

seg-source.mrk: I'm really bad at guessing. Are you a male or a female?

target.mrk: Soy muy malo adivinando. ¿Eres hombre o mujer?

trans-unit.source: I'm really bad at guessing. Is %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% a male or a female?

seg-source.mrk: I'm really bad at guessing. Is %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% a male or a female?

target.mrk: Soy muy malo adivinando. ¿%SUBACCOUNT_NAME% es hombre o mujer?

trans-unit.source: Male. %GENDER_ACK%

seg-source.mrk: Male. %GENDER_ACK%

target.mrk: Hombre. %GENDER_ACK%

trans-unit.source: Female. %GENDER_ACK%

seg-source.mrk: Female. %GENDER_ACK%

target.mrk: Mujer. %GENDER_ACK%

trans-unit.source: That's great — Congratulations! So glad I asked.

seg-source.mrk: That's great — Congratulations! So glad I asked.

target.mrk: Eso es estupendo — ¡Felicidades! Estoy muy feliz de que hayas preguntado.

trans-unit.source: %SYMPTOMS_INTRO%. So what symptoms do we need to know about? You can say things like fever, rash, headache, and so on.

seg-source.mrk: %SYMPTOMS_INTRO%. So what symptoms do we need to know about? You can say things like fever, rash, headache, and so on.

target.mrk: %SYMPTOMS_INTRO%. ¿Entonces que síntomas necesitamos saber acerca de ti? Puedes decir cosas como fiebre, sarpullido, dolor de cabeza, etc.

trans-unit.source: I will read you one option. Just repeat it or say 'continue'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

seg-source.mrk: I will read you one option. Just repeat it or say 'continue'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

target.mrk: Te leeré una opción. Solo repítela o di 'continuar'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

trans-unit.source: I will read you %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS_COUNT% options. Just repeat one or say 'continue'. %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

seg-source.mrk: I will read you %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS_COUNT% options. Just repeat one or say 'continue'. %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

target.mrk: Te leeré opciones de %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS_COUNT%. Solo repite una o di 'continuar'. %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

trans-unit.source: I will read you one option. Just repeat it or say 'continue'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

seg-source.mrk: I will read you one option. Just repeat it or say 'continue'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

target.mrk: Te leeré una opción. Solo repítela o di 'continuar'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

trans-unit.source: I will read you %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS_COUNT% options. Just repeat one or more, or say 'continue'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

seg-source.mrk: I will read you %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS_COUNT% options. Just repeat one or more, or say 'continue'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

target.mrk: Te leeré opciones de %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS_COUNT%. Solo repite una o más, o di 'continuar'. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='1.0s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %REFINEMENT_OPTIONS%

trans-unit.source: How would you describe your %SYMPTOM_NAME% right now? Don’t worry, we understand it may fluctuate, so there’s no right or wrong answer.

seg-source.mrk: How would you describe your %SYMPTOM_NAME% right now? Don’t worry, we understand it may fluctuate, so there’s no right or wrong answer.

target.mrk: ¿Cómo describirías tu %SYMPTOM_NAME% en este momento? No te preocupes, entendemos que puede fluctuar, así que no hay una respuesta correcta o incorrecta.

trans-unit.source: How would you describe %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%’s %SYMPTOM_NAME% right now? Don’t worry, we understand it may fluctuate, so there’s no right or wrong answer.

seg-source.mrk: How would you describe %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%’s %SYMPTOM_NAME% right now? Don’t worry, we understand it may fluctuate, so there’s no right or wrong answer.

target.mrk: ¿Cómo describirías el %SYMPTOM_NAME% de %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% en este momento? No te preocupes, entendemos que puede fluctuar, así que no hay una respuesta correcta o incorrecta.

trans-unit.source: So, how quickly did the %SYMPTOM_NAME% develop?

seg-source.mrk: So, how quickly did the %SYMPTOM_NAME% develop?

target.mrk: Entonces, ¿qué tan rápido se desarrollo el/la %SYMPTOM_NAME%?

trans-unit.source: So, how quickly did the %SYMPTOM_NAME% develop?

seg-source.mrk: So, how quickly did the %SYMPTOM_NAME% develop?

target.mrk: Entonces, ¿qué tan rápido se desarrollo el/la %SYMPTOM_NAME%?

trans-unit.source: Where do you feel your %SYMPTOM_NAME%? You can pick one or more places.

seg-source.mrk: Where do you feel your %SYMPTOM_NAME%? You can pick one or more places.

target.mrk: ¿Dónde sientes tu %SYMPTOM_NAME%? Puedes elegir uno o más lugares.

trans-unit.source: Where does %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% feel his %SYMPTOM_NAME%? You can pick one or more places.

seg-source.mrk: Where does %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% feel his %SYMPTOM_NAME%? You can pick one or more places.

target.mrk: ¿Dónde siente %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% su %SYMPTOM_NAME%? Puedes elegir uno o más lugares.

trans-unit.source: Where does %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% feel her %SYMPTOM_NAME%? You can pick one or more places.

seg-source.mrk: Where does %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% feel her %SYMPTOM_NAME%? You can pick one or more places.

target.mrk: ¿Dónde siente %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% su %SYMPTOM_NAME%? Puedes elegir uno o más lugares.

trans-unit.source: Ok. Does your %SYMPTOM_NAME% radiate to the %ONLY_OPTION%?

seg-source.mrk: Ok. Does your %SYMPTOM_NAME% radiate to the %ONLY_OPTION%?

target.mrk: Ok. ¿Tu %SYMPTOM_NAME% se irradia a %ONLY_OPTION%?

trans-unit.source: Ok. Does your %SYMPTOM_NAME% radiate to any of these areas? Tell us which ones (if any)

seg-source.mrk: Ok. Does your %SYMPTOM_NAME% radiate to any of these areas? Tell us which ones (if any)

trans-unit.source: Now, while we review your symptoms, it's a good time to remind you that I'm only here to help you be better informed. I've been trained by thousands of doctors, but I still don't have my medical school degree. Only a real doctor can give you advice or a diagnosis. I could connect you with a real doctor in just a moment. But If you believe you may be having a medical emergency, please call your doctor, or seek medical emergency care immediately. Thanks for listening. Now let's go over our findings.

seg-source.mrk: Now, while we review your symptoms, it's a good time to remind you that I'm only here to help you be better informed. I've been trained by thousands of doctors, but I still don't have my medical school degree. Only a real doctor can give you advice or a diagnosis. I could connect you with a real doctor in just a moment. But If you believe you may be having a medical emergency, please call your doctor, or seek medical emergency care immediately. Thanks for listening. Now let's go over our findings.

target.mrk: Ahora, mientras revisamos tus síntomas, es un bueno momento para recordarte que solo estoy aquí para ayudarte a estar mejor informado. He sido entrenado por miles de doctores, pero todavía no tengo mi título de la escuela de medicina. Solo un doctor real te puede dar consejo o un diagnóstico. Te podría conectar con un doctor en solo un momento. Pero si crees que puedes estar teniendo una emergencia médica, por favor llama a tu doctor, o busca atención médica de emergencia inmediatamente. Gracias por escuchar. Ahora repasemos nuestros hallazgos.

trans-unit.source: Ok, %EXPERTS_INVOLVED_COUNT% doctors helped me compute these findings. Wow, that's a lot of white coats. %CONDITION_REPORT%.

seg-source.mrk: Ok, %EXPERTS_INVOLVED_COUNT% doctors helped me compute these findings. Wow, that's a lot of white coats. %CONDITION_REPORT%.

target.mrk: Ok, %EXPERTS_INVOLVED_COUNT% doctores me ayudaron a computar estos hallazgos. Wow, esas son muchas batas blancas. %CONDITION_REPORT%.

trans-unit.source: So, what is it? %CONDITION_DESCRIPTION% ... Many of our doctors believe that %CONDITION_EXPLANATION%. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% Would you like to talk to a doctor about this now by phone? There may be a charge of 44 dollars.

seg-source.mrk: So, what is it? %CONDITION_DESCRIPTION% ... Many of our doctors believe that %CONDITION_EXPLANATION%. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% Would you like to talk to a doctor about this now by phone? There may be a charge of 44 dollars.

target.mrk: Entonces, ¿qué es? %CONDITION_DESCRIPTION% ... Muchos de nuestros doctores creen que %CONDITION_EXPLANATION%. %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% ¿Te gustaría hablar con un doctor al respecto por teléfono en este momento? Puede haber un cargo de 44 dólares.

trans-unit.source: It's so good of you to help your %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE%. What is his name?

seg-source.mrk: It's so good of you to help your %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE%. What is his name?

target.mrk: Es muy bueno de tu parte que estés ayudando a tu %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE%. ¿Cuál es su nombre?

trans-unit.source: It's so good of you to help your %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE%. What is her name?

seg-source.mrk: It's so good of you to help your %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE%. What is her name?

target.mrk: Es muy bueno de tu parte que estés ayudando a tu %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE%. ¿Cuál es su nombre?

trans-unit.source: It's so good of you to help. What is the name of this person

seg-source.mrk: It's so good of you to help. What is the name of this person

target.mrk: Es muy bueno de tu parte ayudar. ¿Cuál es el nombre de esta persona?

trans-unit.source: Would you like to talk to a doctor about this now by phone? There may be a charge of 44 dollars.

seg-source.mrk: Would you like to talk to a doctor about this now by phone? There may be a charge of 44 dollars.

target.mrk: ¿Te gustaría hablar con un doctor al respecto por teléfono en este momento? Puede haber un cargo de 44 dólares.

trans-unit.source: OK. Please tell me your phone number where you can receive U.S. calls and text messages and I will call you to connect you with a doctor now. Or just say 'skip'.

seg-source.mrk: OK. Please tell me your phone number where you can receive U.S. calls and text messages and I will call you to connect you with a doctor now. Or just say 'skip'.

target.mrk: OK. Por favor, dime tu número de teléfono donde puedas recibir llamadas y mensajes de texto de EE.UU. y te llamaré para conectarte con un doctor ahora. O solo di 'saltar'.

trans-unit.source: Oops, sorry about that. I should see an Audiologist to get my hearing checked! Please say your phone number again.

seg-source.mrk: Oops, sorry about that. I should see an Audiologist to get my hearing checked! Please say your phone number again.

target.mrk: Oops, perdón por eso. ¡Debería de ver a un audiólogo para que me revisen mi oído! Por favor, di tu número de teléfono otra vez.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, that didn't seem like a valid phone number. Can you say a phone number where you can receive calls and text messages? You can always say 'Never mind' if you no longer want to connect with a doctor.

seg-source.mrk: Sorry, that didn't seem like a valid phone number. Can you say a phone number where you can receive calls and text messages? You can always say 'Never mind' if you no longer want to connect with a doctor.

target.mrk: Perdón, eso no pareció un número de teléfono válido. ¿Puedes decir un número de teléfono donde puedas recibir llamadas y mensajes de texto? Siempre puedes decir 'No importa' si ya no quieres conectarte con un doctor.

trans-unit.source: Got it. I heard %PHONE_NUMBER%. Did I get that right?

seg-source.mrk: Got it. I heard %PHONE_NUMBER%. Did I get that right?

target.mrk: Lo tengo. Escuche %PHONE_NUMBER%. ¿Estuvo bien?

trans-unit.source: Alright, excellent. Now just sit back, relax, and we'll be calling you momentarily!

seg-source.mrk: Alright, excellent. Now just sit back, relax, and we'll be calling you momentarily!

target.mrk: Bien, excelente. ¡Ahora siéntate, relájate y te llamaremos momentáneamente!

trans-unit.source: Excellent. It was very nice speaking with you. I'm Doctor A.I. and I'm signing off now. From all of us at HealthTap, we wish you the best in health and happiness. Good bye.

seg-source.mrk: Excellent. It was very nice speaking with you. I'm Doctor A.I. and I'm signing off now. From all of us at HealthTap, we wish you the best in health and happiness. Good bye.

target.mrk: Excelente. Fue muy agradable hablar contigo. Soy Doctor A.I. y me despido. De todos nosotros en HealthTap, te deseamos lo mejor en salud y felicidad. Adiós.

trans-unit.source: Alright, it was a pleasure chatting with you. Remember, the doctor is always in at HealthTap. Take good care. This is Doctor A.I. signing off.

seg-source.mrk: Alright, it was a pleasure chatting with you. Remember, the doctor is always in at HealthTap. Take good care. This is Doctor A.I. signing off.

target.mrk: Bueno, fue un placer platicar contigo. Recuerda, el doctor siempre está en HealthTap. Cuídate. Este es Doctor A.I. despidiéndose.

trans-unit.source: Great, one last question. By any chance, do you have a HealthTap Prime pre-paid access code? If so, please say the five-digit code or or say 'no'.

seg-source.mrk: Great, one last question. By any chance, do you have a HealthTap Prime pre-paid access code? If so, please say the five-digit code or or say 'no'.

target.mrk: Estupendo, una última pregunta. De casualidad, ¿tienes un código de acceso de prepago para HealthTap Prime? Si es así, por favor di el código de cinco dígitos o di 'no'.

trans-unit.source: Your account has been reset and the current session is ended

seg-source.mrk: Your account has been reset and the current session is ended

target.mrk: Tu cuenta ha sido reiniciada y la sesión actual ha terminado

trans-unit.source: Doctor A.I. helps you understand your symptoms to show you the best path to feeling good. If you need me to repeat any instructions, simply say Repeat'. You can always say 'Start Over' to go back to the beginning. Or say 'Stop' to end our conversation.

seg-source.mrk: Doctor A.I. helps you understand your symptoms to show you the best path to feeling good. If you need me to repeat any instructions, simply say Repeat'. You can always say 'Start Over' to go back to the beginning. Or say 'Stop' to end our conversation.

target.mrk: Doctor A.I. te ayuda a comprender tus síntomas para mostrarte el mejor camino para sentirte bien. Si necesitas que repita cualquier instrucción, simplemente di 'Repetir'. Siempre puedes decir 'Volver a Empezar' para volver al comienzo. O di 'Detener' para terminar nuestra conversación.

trans-unit.source: You can say either 'Yes' or 'No' depending on whether you have a HealthTap account and you want to link it to your Alexa device.

seg-source.mrk: You can say either 'Yes' or 'No' depending on whether you have a HealthTap account and you want to link it to your Alexa device.

target.mrk: Puedes decir ya sea 'Sí' o 'No' dependiendo de si tienes una cuenta de HealthTap y la quieres enlazar a tu dispositivo Alexa.

trans-unit.source: Are you a male or a female?

seg-source.mrk: Are you a male or a female?

target.mrk: ¿Eres hombre o mujer?

trans-unit.source: Is %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% a male or a female?

seg-source.mrk: Is %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% a male or a female?

target.mrk: ¿%SUBACCOUNT_NAME% es hombre o mujer?

trans-unit.source: Simply say the year in which you were born. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

seg-source.mrk: Simply say the year in which you were born. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

target.mrk: Simplemente di el año en que naciste. Por favor, di el año de nacimiento, o trata de aproximarte si no estás seguro.

trans-unit.source: Simply say the year in which %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% was born. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

seg-source.mrk: Simply say the year in which %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% was born. Please say the birth year, or just approximate it if you're not sure.

target.mrk: Simplemente di el año en que nació %SUBACCOUNT_NAME%. Por favor, di el año de nacimiento, o trata de aproximarte si no estás seguro.

trans-unit.source: Are you pregnant? Just say Yes or No or I don't know

seg-source.mrk: Are you pregnant? Just say Yes or No or I don't know

target.mrk: ¿Estás embarazada? Solo di Sí o No o No sé

trans-unit.source: Is %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% pregnant? Just say Yes or No or I don't know

seg-source.mrk: Is %SUBACCOUNT_NAME% pregnant? Just say Yes or No or I don't know

target.mrk: ¿%SUBACCOUNT_NAME% está embarazada? Solo di Sí o No o No sé

trans-unit.source: Say the name of a symptom like 'cough', 'back pain', or 'fever'.

seg-source.mrk: Say the name of a symptom like 'cough', 'back pain', or 'fever'.

target.mrk: Di el nombre de un síntoma como 'tos', 'dolor de espalda' o 'fiebre'.

trans-unit.source: In your Alexa app, select 'Link accounts' to connect your HealthTap account. When you're done, say 'done.' Or you can always say 'cancel' if you change your mind.

seg-source.mrk: In your Alexa app, select 'Link accounts' to connect your HealthTap account. When you're done, say 'done.' Or you can always say 'cancel' if you change your mind.

target.mrk: En tu aplicación de Alexa selecciona 'Enlazar cuentas' para conectarte con tu cuenta de HealthTap. Cuanto termines, di 'listo.' O siempre puedes decir 'cancelar' si cambias de opinión.

trans-unit.source: Who are we helping today? Say me, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %SUBACCOUNTS% %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

seg-source.mrk: Who are we helping today? Say me, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %SUBACCOUNTS% %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

target.mrk: ¿A quién estamos ayudando hoy? Di a mí, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% %SUBACCOUNTS% %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% o a alguien más?

trans-unit.source: Who are we helping today? Say me, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

seg-source.mrk: Who are we helping today? Say me, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% or someone else?

target.mrk: ¿A quién estamos ayudando hoy? Di a mí, %SPECIAL_TAG%<break time='0.5s'/>%SPECIAL_TAG% o a alguien más?

trans-unit.source: Say 'yes' if you have other symptoms to report. Otherwise say 'no'. Do you have any more symptoms to tell me?

seg-source.mrk: Say 'yes' if you have other symptoms to report. Otherwise say 'no'. Do you have any more symptoms to tell me?

target.mrk: Di 'sí' si tienes otros síntomas que reportar. De otra forma di 'no'. ¿Tienes alguno síntoma más que contarme?

trans-unit.source: You can say any one of the following: %ALL_RELATIONSHIPS%

seg-source.mrk: You can say any one of the following: %ALL_RELATIONSHIPS%

target.mrk: Puedes decir cualquiera de las siguientes: %ALL_RELATIONSHIPS%

trans-unit.source: Say the name or a nickname for your %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE% to continue

seg-source.mrk: Say the name or a nickname for your %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE% to continue

target.mrk: Di el nombre o apodo de tu %SUBACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE% para continuar

trans-unit.source: Please say your phone number where you can receive calls and text messages. Or say cancel.

seg-source.mrk: Please say your phone number where you can receive calls and text messages. Or say cancel.

target.mrk: Por favor, di tu número de teléfono donde puedas recibir llamadas y mensajes de texto. O di cancelar.

trans-unit.source: Did I hear your phone number correctly? Is it %PHONE_NUMBER%? Say 'yes' or 'no'.

seg-source.mrk: Did I hear your phone number correctly? Is it %PHONE_NUMBER%? Say 'yes' or 'no'.

target.mrk: ¿Escuche tu número de teléfono correctamente? ¿Es %PHONE_NUMBER%? Di 'sí' o 'no'.

trans-unit.source: I can arrange for you to talk to a doctor by phone for just 44 dollars. Would you like me to set up a call?

seg-source.mrk: I can arrange for you to talk to a doctor by phone for just 44 dollars. Would you like me to set up a call?

target.mrk: Puedo arreglar que hables con un doctor por teléfono por solo 44 dólares. ¿Te gustaría que realizara una llamada?

trans-unit.source: Do you have a special payment code? Say the five-digit access code you may have or say 'no'

seg-source.mrk: Do you have a special payment code? Say the five-digit access code you may have or say 'no'

target.mrk: ¿Tienes un código de pago especial? Di el código de acceso de cinco dígitos que puedas tener o di 'no'

trans-unit.source: Great to hear from you again.

seg-source.mrk: Great to hear from you again.

target.mrk: Es bueno escuchar de ti otra vez.

trans-unit.source: It's good to hear from you again.

seg-source.mrk: It's good to hear from you again.

target.mrk: Es bueno oír de ti otra vez.

trans-unit.source: I missed you.

seg-source.mrk: I missed you.

target.mrk: Te extrañe.

trans-unit.source: I've had you on my mind.

seg-source.mrk: I've had you on my mind.

target.mrk: Has estado en mi mente.

trans-unit.source: They say an apple a day keeps the doctor away, but...

seg-source.mrk: They say an apple a day keeps the doctor away, but...

target.mrk: Dicen que una manzana al día mantiene al doctor lejos, pero...

trans-unit.source: It's my duty to give you sound advice, and...

seg-source.mrk: It's my duty to give you sound advice, and...

target.mrk: Es mi deber darte buen consejo, y...

trans-unit.source: I took an oath to give you sound advice, and...

seg-source.mrk: I took an oath to give you sound advice, and...

target.mrk: Tome un juramente para darte buen consejo, y...

trans-unit.source: That's okay. My feelings aren't hurt.

seg-source.mrk: That's okay. My feelings aren't hurt.

target.mrk: Está bien. Mis sentimientos no están heridos.

trans-unit.source: That's OK. We've got work to do.

seg-source.mrk: That's OK. We've got work to do.

target.mrk: Está bien. Tenemos trabajo que hacer.

trans-unit.source: That's OK. You have other things on your mind.

seg-source.mrk: That's OK. You have other things on your mind.

target.mrk: Está bien. Tienes otras cosas en la cabeza.

trans-unit.source: That's okay. But you know I'm going to nag you about that next time. Just sayin'.

seg-source.mrk: That's okay. But you know I'm going to nag you about that next time. Just sayin'.

target.mrk: Está bien. Pero sabes que voy a molestarte por eso la próxima vez. Solo te aviso.

trans-unit.source: That's okay. I'm happy to remind you about that later.

seg-source.mrk: That's okay. I'm happy to remind you about that later.

target.mrk: Está bien. Estoy feliz de recordarte eso después.

trans-unit.source: Let's begin.

seg-source.mrk: Let's begin.

target.mrk: Empecemos.

trans-unit.source: Let's get started.

seg-source.mrk: Let's get started.

target.mrk: Hay que empezar.

trans-unit.source: Let's get into it.

seg-source.mrk: Let's get into it.

target.mrk: Hay que darle.

trans-unit.source: Very good. Thank you.

seg-source.mrk: Very good. Thank you.

target.mrk: Muy bien. Gracias.

trans-unit.source: Got it. Making a note. Thanks.

seg-source.mrk: Got it. Making a note. Thanks.

target.mrk: Lo tengo. Haciendo una nota. Gracias.

trans-unit.source: OK.

seg-source.mrk: OK.

target.mrk: OK.

trans-unit.source: Alright.

seg-source.mrk: Alright.

target.mrk: Bien.

trans-unit.source: Moving along.

seg-source.mrk: Moving along.

target.mrk: Sigamos.

trans-unit.source: OK, here we go.

seg-source.mrk: OK, here we go.

target.mrk: Ok, aquí vamos.

seg-source.mrk: OK. You said

target.mrk: Ok. Tú dijiste

seg-source.mrk: Got it. You said

target.mrk: Lo tengo. Tú dijiste

trans-unit.source: Alright. You said

seg-source.mrk: Alright. You said

target.mrk: Bueno. Tú dijiste

seg-source.mrk: Got it. I heard

seg-source.mrk: I got you. You said

seg-source.mrk: Gotcha. You said

target.mrk: Te tengo. Tú dijiste

trans-unit.source: Are there more symptoms you'd like to tell me about? Say yes...or no'

seg-source.mrk: Are there more symptoms you'd like to tell me about? Say yes...or no'

target.mrk: ¿Hay más síntomas de los que te gustaría contarme? Di sí...o no'

seg-source.mrk: Are there other symptoms I should know about? Say yes...or no'

seg-source.mrk: Any other symptoms? Say yes...or 'no'

trans-unit.source: I'm all ears. Tell me the next symptom.
